code: export var $useGet=function $useGet(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var callback=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var data=[];fetch(url).then(function(res){if(res.status!==200){console.error("".concat(url," Server Error"));return;}return res.json();}).then(function(resData){data=resData!==null&&resData!==void 0?resData:[];callback({data:data});});};export var $usePost=function $usePost(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var newData=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var callback=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;var data=[];fetch(url,{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(newData)}).then(function(res){if(res.status!==200){console.error("".concat(url," Server Error"));return;}return res.json();}).then(function(){data=newData;callback({data:data});});};export var $usePut=function $usePut(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var newData=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var callback=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;var data=[];fetch(url,{method:'PUT',body:JSON.stringify(newData)}).then(function(res){if(res.status!==200){console.error("".concat(url," Server Error"));return;}return res.json();}).then(function(){data=newData;callback({data:data});});};export var $useDelete=function $useDelete(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var callback=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;fetch(url,{method:'DELETE'}).then(function(res){if(res.status!==200){console.error("".concat(url," Server Error"));return;}return res.json();}).then(function(){callback();});};
